mapper.select: SELECT user_id, type, state, fail_reason, doctor_pic, medical_license, business_license, tax_registration, opening_permit, radiological_permit, id_card_positive, id_card_otherside FROM certification WHERE user_id=#{userId}

SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT count(0) FROM certification c LEFT JOIN `user` u ON c.user_id=u.user_id
u.phone LIKE '%${phone}%'
AND u.true_name LIKE '%${trueName}%'
AND c.company_name LIKE '%${companyName}%'
AND c.type=#{type}
AND c.state=#{state}
AND c.doctor_pic!='' AND c.type!=''
AND c.type!='' AND c.medical_license!='' AND c.business_license!='' AND c.tax_registration!=''
GROUP BY c.user_id ) AS a
